text: Basin is a town in the American state of Wyoming. It is the county seat of Big Horn County. It had 1,288 people living in it at the 2020 census. Basin is near the Big Horn river. The town has an area of 2.0 mi². 0.04 mi² of it (1.47%) is water. ==References== Category:Towns in Wyoming Category:Big Horn County, Wyoming Category:County seats in Wyoming
title: Basin, Wyoming
